1.title: Pythtris
1.description: This project was my first real venture into the Python programming language, it is a Tetris game made using the Pygame library, for a school project.

2.title: Portfolio
2.description: You're lookin' at it! This is my portfolio website built on JS/HTML/CSS, displaying all of my previously completed projects. In the future I would like to host this page on a more dynamic platform so it can update automatically when I publish a new project.
